titles.title: A Mighty Fortress Is Our God

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A mighty fortress is our God,
A bulwark never failing,
A bulwark never failing,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Bulwark never failing,
A bulwark never failing,
A bulwark never failing,
A bulwark never failing.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Our helper He amid the,
Flood our helper He,
Our helper amid the flood,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Of mortal ills prevailing,
Mid mortal ills prevailing,

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
For still our ancient foe,
For still our ancient foe,
Doth seek for us woe,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Doth seek for us woe,
With craft and great might,
With craft and great might,

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Armed with cruel hate,
And armed with cruel hate,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And armed with cruel hate,
On earth is none His equal,
On earth is none equal.
